text: The Moroccan ambassador in Moscow is the official representative of the Government in Rabat to the Government of Russia. He is concurrently accredited in Astana (Kazakhstan) and Minsk (Belarus). == List of Representatives == {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !|Russian language !|Arabian language !| Observations !| List of rulers of Morocco !| Prime Minister of Russia !| term end |- | |Abdelkrim Ben Sliman | | |Abdelkarim (died September 1907) |Abdelaziz of Morocco |Nicholas II of Russia | |- | |Bashir Bel Abbes | | |Bashir Bel Abbes |Mohammed V of Morocco |Nikita Khrushchev | |- | |Mohammed Abdelhadi Sbihi Alaui el Idrissi | | |Moroccan diplomatist; b. 18 Nov. 1925; ed. title: List of ambassadors of Morocco to Russia
